2026-02-02.content:
The Firestore databases page in the Google Cloud console now includes
a status column. Possible statuses include:

* Ready
* Cloning is in progress
* Restoring from backup is in progress
* Deleted
* Failed

For the cloning and restore statuses, the status column updates upon completion.

summary.title: New status column in Firestore databases page
summary.summary: The Firestore databases page in the Google Cloud console now displays a status column. This column provides real-time updates on database states such as Ready, Cloning, Restoring, Deleted, or Failed, improving visibility into database operations.

2025-12-22.content:
### Python

#### [2.22.0](https://github.com/googleapis/python-datastore/compare/v2.21.0...v2.22.0) (2025-12-12)

##### Bug Fixes

* remove setup.cfg configuration for creating universal wheels (#601) ([df729015](https://github.com/googleapis/python-datastore/commit/df729015))

### Python

#### [2.23.0](https://github.com/googleapis/python-datastore/compare/v2.22.0...v2.23.0) (2025-12-16)

##### Features

* support mTLS certificates when available (#658) ([85c02328](https://github.com/googleapis/python-datastore/commit/85c02328))

### Java

summary.title: Datastore Library Updates
summary.summary: Recent updates to the Python and Java Datastore libraries include new features like mTLS support in Python and enhanced APIs in Java, alongside various bug fixes and dependency upgrades across both.

2025-12-15.content:
### Java

#### [2.33.1](https://github.com/googleapis/java-datastore/compare/v2.33.0...v2.33.1) (2025-12-11)

##### Bug Fixes

* **deps:** Update the Java code generator (gapic-generator-java) to 2.64.2 ([b5f1285](https://github.com/googleapis/java-datastore/commit/b5f1285bb783c004464b0f7e8b1fcea567ea22d5))

##### Dependencies

* Update dependency com.google.cloud:sdk-platform-java-config to v3.54.2 ([#2011](https://github.com/googleapis/java-datastore/issues/2011)) ([c2062e7](https://github.com/googleapis/java-datastore/commit/c2062e77f0ae50981ff381bd82151720f31aa83a))
* Update googleapis/sdk-platform-java action to v2.64.2 ([#2012](https://github.com/googleapis/java-datastore/issues/2012)) ([3ad3168](https://github.com/googleapis/java-datastore/commit/3ad31689197a97d3496ae10fa3338d15d9df022f))

summary.title: Datastore library update
summary.summary: The Datastore Java library has been updated to version 2.33.1. This release includes dependency updates and a fix for the Java code generator.

2025-10-27.content:
The [database clone feature](https://docs.cloud.google.com/datastore/docs/manage-databases#clone-database) is now
supported at the General Availability ([GA](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages)) level.

summary.title: Database cloning is now GA
summary.summary: The database clone feature is now supported at General Availability.

2025-10-27.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the [Cloud SDK](https://docs.cloud.google.com/sdk).

### Java

2025-09-02.content: Use [Query insights](https://cloud.google.com/datastore/docs/query-insights) to view query performance metrics for your database. This feature is now generally available ([GA](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages)).

summary.title: Query insights now GA
summary.summary: Query insights is now generally available. Use this feature to view query performance metrics for your database.

2025-08-25.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the [Cloud SDK](https://cloud.google.com/sdk).

### Java
